mapper.insert: insert into SHOP_EMPLOYEE_TBL values ( shop_employee_sql.nextval, #{employeeName}, #{employeeRank}, #{employeePhone}, #{adress}, #{registrationNumber}, #{imageName}, #{imagePath}, #{email}, default, 0)
mapper.select: select employee_idx as employeeIdx, employee_name as employeeName, employee_rank as employeeRank, employee_phone as employeePhone, enroll_date as enrollDate, sell_count as sellCount from (select rownum as rnum, m.* from (select * from SHOP_EMPLOYEE_TBL order by rownum desc) m) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
